<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Running Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=4875) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 6), [Drow Shootist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=90) (Level 8), [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169) (Level 8), [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183) (Level 6), [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238) (Level 6), [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=249) (Level 8)

</column>

---

You can reload your weapon on the move. You [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=88), [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87), or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63), then [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=80) to reload.
